1. Install Node.Js (x86/x64 on your platform)
2. Install WkHtmlOx (add path to bin folder to your environment variables)
3. start command prompt from c:\
4. execute in command propt:
4.1 npm -g install marked 
4.2 npm -g install wkhtmltopdf

5. Usage:
5.1 marked <input markdown file> -o <output html file>
5.2 wkhtmltopdf <html from 5.1 file> <resulted pdf file>
